verses.roman:
prabhu krame krame pāṅca-dina ghāṭāila
pāṅca-dina tāṅra bhikṣā niyama karila

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; krame krame—gradually; pāṅca-dina—to five days; ghāṭāila—reduced; pāṅca-dina—for five days; tāṅra—his; bhikṣā—invitation for lunch; niyama karila—accepted regularly.
translation: In this way, by and by, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu reduced the duration to five days. Thus for five days He regularly accepted the invitation to lunch.
